summary.para: Obtains a client identifier for a CLSID.

param.name: rclsid
param.para: CLSID to obtain the client identifier for.

param.name: ptid
param.para: Pointer to a TfClientId value that receives the client identifier.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

remarks.para: An application obtains its client identifier by calling and a text service receives its client identifier in its method. ITfClientId.GetClientId enables TSF objects that do not fit either of these categories to obtain their own client identifier.

summary.para: The ITfClientId interface is implemented by the TSF manager. This interface is used to obtain a client identifier for TSF objects. An instance of this interface is obtained by querying the thread manager with IID_ITfClientId.
